choices: Gets a job at a fast-food joint
1.content: How will Louis gain weight?
1.title: How will Louis gain weight?

info.brief_description: Louis from Even Stevens puts on weight and gets fat.
info.description:
A Louis Stevens weight gain story.

No "He suddenly became 500 pounds." Try and make the story as realistic as possible

PLEASE make additions to the story, its much appreciated. If you could make them lengthily, too, that'd be great :)
